mapper.insert:
insert into sys_dict
id,
`type`, type_name, `label`, `value`, remark, seq,
values
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on duplicate key update

`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `value` = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},

insert into sys_dict
id,
`type`,
type_name,
`label`,
`value`,
remark,
seq,
values
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on duplicate key update
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`label` = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`value` = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: select `label`, `value` from sys_dict where `type`=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by seq desc
